systems.name: Reward Screen System
systems.description: System governing interactions on the reward screen of Tank War
systems.mechanics: Players view rewards and interact with buttons ('Collect' and 'Double')
systems.objectives: Ensure players can view all rewards and remain engaged
interactions: Clicking 'Collect' redirects to the main screen
Clicking 'Double' shows an ad and doubles rewards upon return
